comments.body: For me it would be a better idea that by putting any type of furnace with soul sand / soul soil on the crafting table you could do what you say, increasing its efficiency
I like the idea of more ice options. I could build an ice castle on top of the new ice mountains.
great idea
Beautiful idea, it would be such a nice way to celebrate the community.

I think this is obviously a great idea! The ability for things to rust when underwater or when touching water would also be a cool feature too I believe! And maybe when just touching water that side of the block only gets rusted and mechanics like that! And to note your idea of the disappearing crumbling blocks I would say that it could happen to structures like desert temples, strongholds and places like that! And I believe if these ideas were to be implemented the ability to paint walls and stuff like that would be really good! Maybe call it the decoration update!

i think amethyst should be mixed with lapis to make amethyst ingot and make amehyst armour and the effect should be potion resetince and boost like splash potion of damaging does less and regeneration does more.

I think the effect would be relate to magic or enchanment. Like if u enchant an amethyst armour or tools, the effect will slightly increase the enchantment power.

Disenchant amethyst armour and tools will also give u more xp, and if you have curses on your diamond armour and tools, upgrade it into amethyst armour or tools will remove the curses.

That would be so helpfull for technical constructions. And I also would see this in the parkour scene, easy to build horse elevators and other advanced topics like special farm designs.

I guess this should not be that hard to implement. And the advanced minecraft community would greatly benefit from that without obstructing any "normal" players.

I hope they will do it.
Would be really cool if the armor oxidized as well the longer the player wore it.
Why would the Warden be distracted by them, it´s blind.
To be honest I missed that part about the warden being blind, I’m going to leave the suggestion up though in case mojang decides to consider it partly blind or something.
I like this idea but I think it needs to be based on the tinkling sound the crystal makes. It would confused the warden. Maybe a crystal chime that can be rung with redstone?
This is like the soul torch just purple and made of amethyst.
I support this idea
I think they should be able to be placed in water so you don’t get lost in caves
I think it should pose as a light source that makes no noises so you can just throw it and the warden can't hear it
Add Slime ball to create sticky glow sticks to help light up the tops of the new cave generation

You should also be able to place blocks in it like chests and hay bales.

 

you should only be able not find them in villages like saddles and you should have to have a horse with a saddle and two leads to move them

Its a good idea if mojang added a frozen castle I think they shouldn't be impossible to go up but you can slide and go down VERY fast please made a post about a frozeen castle you have great ideas if you do it post a comment with a link.
yeah icy stairs slippery but impossible troll time :)
Some times stairs in ice biomes will frost over if they are directly under the sky.
Let’s make this happen!
I don't see it having a point for use...

i think there should be various totems that don't give you effects or anything but instead it is like the normal one which has a unique thing. there should be a speed totem which gives you speed when you hold it. a totem of luck which increases the chances of newly generated chests containing good items. this is already a feature in java edition creative mode but this is a nice way of introducing it into survival mode in both versions
Me encanta, serviria para darle mas uso a la obsidiana llorosa
Hii 4x4
That would be too powerful and would make any challenge the game makes invalid.
Es muy roto, muy chetado no lo agregaran
Rainbow ore that can be used to make rainbow armor, pickaxes, and axes. It could be found near lava.
this is a cool idea and im sure they could potentially do it with some balancing but i dont think it should be called "Glitch Armor" it just seems a bit to meta for the game
sounds like a mod to me.
I like glitchy stuff
yes, because If you are trying to build a flooded village, atleast  the paths would be as ugly so thankyou I didn't think of that
Yes, it would make for very good farm pathways that provide water for the plants while providing level-grounded paths through it.
How about mini Chorus Fungi that can glow and you can place them like torches in the end? I think that would be a better addition since End Rods are kinda like the End's torches.
We would also need Chorus Lanterns, Chorus Campfires, and Chorus Jack-O'-Lanterns.
Please be more specific about how good the furnaces and tools would be

I agree! It's like how blackstone is cobblestone in the Nether and endstone is cobblestone in the End. If blackstone can be used as cobblestone in crafting, why not endstone? It doesn't really have another use other than building and crafting weak endstone bricks. This could give it more use in the End if you need a furnace or something.
Goldkittie, wouldn't the furnaces and tools be the same as crafting with cobblestone? They're variants of stone, after all.
Its flying height should also be restricted.
Love the idea! Maybe it could also be a potion ingredient for something?
Being a cheaper, limited version of something already in the game, I don't think this would be added.
I like the idea, but I would suggest to just use a furnace to convert it to sand. The explosion thing in different dimensions looks too complicated

We definitely need a 'legit' sand farm, i dissagree on this way though, it's just too slow. On bedrock we don't have a TNT dupers, so we need a TONS of sand, i wonder if we can introduce a quick way of farming it so it worth AFKing instead of just goin to a desert with a shovel. Piglin trading just won't cut it
Spider eye seems a bit op but this is cool
This is a really good idea. However, I’m not sure about the Netherite one since Netherite is extremely expensive so maybe Netherite Scrap instead?
1. What songs specifically? 2. This would likely violate copyright.
no

Add crab rave

Pls
A CRAB RAVE WOULD BE GLORIOUS!!!!!!!!

I agree. It could also have a second slot. You can put netherite tools, weapons or armor in there. When it melts it down, in real life diamond burns at a lower temperature than gold melts. When a netherite item is put in there, the diamond would burn off, and then the gold would melt where you can recover gold ingots and netherite scraps from the items.
Is this in bedrock? Because it would be really useful if it was. Thanks
Strange idea but could be a really fun element to add
100%. Leather is quite an easy resource to get if you have cows, so why not add a synthetic option?
Piñatex type of Leather made from Pineapple leaves. This item could serve as an alternate way to make leather. It could serve as both a resource for food and/or armor.

My boys and I hate having to kill cows, and you need to kill a lot of them to make all the bookshelves, and then the books, once you start enchanting.

I would love to see a "vegetarian" alternative!

Mojang: "Don't kill dolphins, you monster!"
Also Mojang: Want item frames or books? ＳＬＡＵＧＨＴＥＲ ＴＯＮＳ ＯＦ ＣＯＷＳ

It hurts my conscience to let Hindu and Native American kids play education edition.
